ingredients: 6 to 8 pounds boneless chuck roast, trimmed of excess fat and cut into 2 inch cubes
1 tablespoon vegetable oil or canola oil
1 large white onion, peeled and roughly chopped
10 cloves garlic, peeled and roughly chopped
1 cup beef or chicken broth or lager beer
⅔ cup apple cider vinegar (preferably raw)
¼ cup lime juice (preferably freshly squeezed)
2 tablespoons oregano (preferably Mexican oregano, but all oregano will do!)
